Full Card Format.comment: This the most complex formatting provided presenting all of the main details in an interactive card like presentation

Simple Card Format.comment: This is a simplified version of the full card, the sizes of the image is generally limited, the second title is not shown and the cards are arrange in columns rather than rows.

Image Only Format.comment: This is simplest card format, limited to a clickable image with the primary title shown as hover text.

List Format.comment: The list format only display clickable titles and the comment for each entry, arranged as a simple bulet point list.

list.stitle: Externally-created persistent identifiers are included for items and entities within metadata

list.ptitle: Assign IDs which could be persistent
list.stitle: Items and entities are assigned identifiers which could be machine readable and persistent
Items and entities are assigned identifiers which the organisation commits to persisting
Items and entities are assigned identifiers which are externally resolvable in a human readable format
Items and entities are assigned identifiers which are resolvable in a machine readable format
Items and entities are assigned globally persistent, universally resolvable and maintained identifiers
